item.description:
The votes are in, so let's get together to toast the coming winter season with a viognier tasting and get this group off to a roaring start!

Bring your friends, your friends' friends, and your friends' friends' friends!

If you have a favorite viognier that you'd like to share, send me an email. Otherwise, I'll gather a few selections from around the world. We'll split the cost at the meeting, so bring some cash.

The agenda is:
o Greeting wine while we gather
o Educational discussion on viognier (Noel's chance to pontificate from the "Wine Bible")
o Tasting (4-5 wines from around the world)
o Appetizers all night long

Hope to see you there!
Noel
White Wine Meetup Group

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Viognier Tasting Extraordinaire!
